name: Put All Sections On Alert
Lore: '''We have an emergency alert in detention block AA-twenty three.''',
Text: 'USED: Target a Rebel at a Death Star (or Executor) site. For remainder of turn, target may not use its game text and may not apply ability toward drawing battle destiny. (Immune to Sense.)LOST: Retrieve into hand up to two cards with ''Death Star'' in title.',
